issue.title: [Ruby] Don't install document by gem
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9736](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9736). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Optimization tweak for ruby gems no doc while gems installation using
 "-no-document" . Also removal of depricated "no-ri" and "-no-rdoc".

More detail can be found at
 <https://guides.rubygems.org/command-reference/#installupdate-options-2>
